Name: Cacophony
Effect: Avoids sound-based moves.

Name: Stench
Effect: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

Name: Drizzle
Effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

Name: Speed Boost
Effect: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

Name: Battle Armor
Effect: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Chinese Hànzì: 戰鬥盔甲 / 战斗盔甲

Name: Sturdy
Effect: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

Name: Damp
Effect: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

Name: Limber
Effect: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

Name: Sand Veil
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

Name: Static
Effect: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.

Name: Volt Absorb
Effect: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

Name: Water Absorb
Effect: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.

Name: Oblivious
Effect: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

Name: Cloud Nine
Effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.
Chinese Hànzì: 無關天氣 / 无关天气

Name: Compound Eyes
Effect: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

Name: Insomnia
Effect: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

Name: Color Change
Effect: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

Name: Immunity
Effect: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.

Name: Flash Fire
Effect: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

Name: Shield Dust
Effect: This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

Name: Own Tempo
Effect: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

Name: Suction Cups
Effect: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

Name: Intimidate
Effect: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

Name: Shadow Tag
Effect: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.

Name: Rough Skin
Effect: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
Chinese Hànzì: 粗糙皮膚 / 粗糙皮肤

Name: Wonder Guard
Effect: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
Chinese Hànzì: 神奇守護 / 神奇守护

Name: Levitate
Effect: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Name: Effect Spore
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.

Name: Synchronize
Effect: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

Name: Clear Body
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Chinese Hànzì: 恆淨之軀 / 恒净之躯

Name: Natural Cure
Effect: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Chinese Hànzì: 自然回復 / 自然回复

Name: Lightning Rod
Effect: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

Name: Serene Grace
Effect: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.

Name: Swift Swim
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

Name: Chlorophyll
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in sunshine.

Name: Illuminate
Effect: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

Name: Trace
Effect: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.

Name: Huge Power
Effect: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Name: Poison Point
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Name: Inner Focus
Effect: The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.

Name: Magma Armor
Effect: The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
Chinese Hànzì: 熔岩鎧甲 / 熔岩铠甲

Name: Water Veil
Effect: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Name: Magnet Pull
Effect: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.

Name: Soundproof
Effect: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

Name: Rain Dish
Effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

Name: Sand Stream
Effect: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

Name: Pressure
Effect: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.

Name: Thick Fat
Effect: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Name: Early Bird
Effect: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.

Name: Flame Body
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Chinese Hànzì: 火焰之軀 / 火焰之躯

Name: Run Away
Effect: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

Name: Keen Eye
Effect: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
Chinese Hànzì: 銳利目光 / 锐利目光

Name: Hyper Cutter
Effect: The Pokémon's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

Name: Pickup
Effect: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

Name: Truant
Effect: The Pokémon can't use a move the following turn if it uses one.

Name: Hustle
Effect: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

Name: Cute Charm
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Chinese Hànzì: 迷人之軀 / 迷人之躯

Name: Plus
Effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

Name: Minus
Effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

Name: Forecast
Effect: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
Chinese Hànzì: 陰晴不定 / 阴晴不定

Name: Sticky Hold
Effect: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

Name: Shed Skin
Effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

Name: Guts
Effect: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Name: Marvel Scale
Effect: The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Chinese Hànzì: 神奇鱗片 / 神奇鳞片

Name: Liquid Ooze
Effect: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.

Name: Overgrow
Effect: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

Name: Blaze
Effect: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

Name: Torrent
Effect: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

Name: Swarm
Effect: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Chinese Hànzì: 蟲之預感 / 虫之预感

Name: Rock Head
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Chinese Hànzì: 堅硬腦袋 / 坚硬脑袋

Name: Drought
Effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Name: Arena Trap
Effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

Name: Vital Spirit
Effect: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

Name: White Smoke
Effect: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Chinese Hànzì: 白色煙霧 / 白色烟雾

Name: Pure Power
Effect: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

Name: Shell Armor
Effect: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Chinese Hànzì: 硬殼盔甲 / 硬壳盔甲

Name: Air Lock
Effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Name: Tangled Feet
Effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Name: Motor Drive
Effect: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
Chinese Hànzì: 電氣引擎 / 电气引擎

Name: Rivalry
Effect: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

Name: Steadfast
Effect: The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

Name: Snow Cloak
Effect: Boosts evasion in a hailstorm.

Name: Gluttony
Effect: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

Name: Anger Point
Effect: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
Chinese Hànzì: 憤怒穴位 / 愤怒穴位

Name: Unburden
Effect: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.

Name: Heatproof
Effect: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

Name: Simple
Effect: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.

Name: Dry Skin
Effect: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in sunshine, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 乾燥皮膚 / 干燥皮肤

Name: Download
Effect: Compares an opposing Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

Name: Iron Fist
Effect: Powers up punching moves.

Name: Poison Heal
Effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.

Name: Adaptability
Effect: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

Name: Skill Link
Effect: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.
Chinese Hànzì: 連續攻擊 / 连续攻击

Name: Hydration
Effect: Heals status conditions if it's raining.
Chinese Hànzì: 濕潤之軀 / 湿润之躯

Name: Solar Power
Effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases every turn.
Chinese Hànzì: 太陽之力 / 太阳之力

Name: Quick Feet
Effect: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

Name: Normalize
Effect: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Chinese Hànzì: 一般皮膚 / 一般皮肤

Name: Sniper
Effect: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

Name: Magic Guard
Effect: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Name: No Guard
Effect: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

Name: Stall
Effect: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Name: Technician
Effect: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 技術高手 / 技术高手

Name: Leaf Guard
Effect: Prevents status conditions in sunny weather.
Chinese Hànzì: 葉子防守 / 叶子防守

Name: Klutz
Effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

Name: Mold Breaker
Effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

Name: Super Luck
Effect: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

Name: Aftermath
Effect: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.

Name: Anticipation
Effect: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 危險預知 / 危险预知

Name: Forewarn
Effect: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

Name: Unaware
Effect: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.

Name: Tinted Lens
Effect: The Pokémon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.
Chinese Hànzì: 有色眼鏡 / 有色眼镜

Name: Filter
Effect: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

Name: Slow Start
Effect: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

Name: Scrappy
Effect: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

Name: Storm Drain
Effect: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

Name: Ice Body
Effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
Chinese Hànzì: 冰凍之軀 / 冰冻之躯

Name: Solid Rock
Effect: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Chinese Hànzì: 堅硬岩石 / 坚硬岩石

Name: Snow Warning
Effect: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

Name: Honey Gather
Effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

Name: Frisk
Effect: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

Name: Reckless
Effect: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Name: Multitype
Effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

Name: Flower Gift
Effect: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies when it is sunny.

Name: Bad Dreams
Effect: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

Name: Pickpocket
Effect: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.
Chinese Hànzì: 順手牽羊 / 顺手牵羊

Name: Sheer Force
Effect: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

Name: Contrary
Effect: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Name: Unnerve
Effect: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

Name: Defiant
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

Name: Defeatist
Effect: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

Name: Cursed Body
Effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
Chinese Hànzì: 詛咒之軀 / 诅咒之躯

Name: Healer
Effect: Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.
Chinese Hànzì: 治癒之心 / 治愈之心

Name: Friend Guard
Effect: Reduces damage done to allies.

Name: Weak Armor
Effect: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
Chinese Hànzì: 碎裂鎧甲 / 碎裂铠甲

Name: Heavy Metal
Effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Name: Light Metal
Effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

Name: Multiscale
Effect: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
Chinese Hànzì: 多重鱗片 / 多重鳞片

Name: Toxic Boost
Effect: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

Name: Flare Boost
Effect: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.
Chinese Hànzì: 受熱激升 / 受热激升

Name: Harvest
Effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

Name: Telepathy
Effect: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
Chinese Hànzì: 心靈感應 / 心灵感应

Name: Moody
Effect: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

Name: Overcoat
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

Name: Poison Touch
Effect: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

Name: Regenerator
Effect: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

Name: Big Pecks
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
Chinese Hànzì: 健壯胸肌 / 健壮胸肌

Name: Sand Rush
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

Name: Wonder Skin
Effect: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
Chinese Hànzì: 奇跡皮膚 / 奇迹皮肤

Name: Analytic
Effect: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

Name: Illusion
Effect: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party's last spot.

Name: Imposter
Effect: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

Name: Infiltrator
Effect: Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

Name: Mummy
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

Name: Moxie
Effect: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
Chinese Hànzì: 自信過度 / 自信过度

Name: Justified
Effect: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
Chinese Hànzì: 正義之心 / 正义之心

Name: Rattled
Effect: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.

Name: Magic Bounce
Effect: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.

Name: Sap Sipper
Effect: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.

Name: Prankster
Effect: Gives priority to a status move.
Chinese Hànzì: 惡作劇之心 / 恶作剧之心

Name: Sand Force
Effect: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

Name: Iron Barbs
Effect: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.

Name: Zen Mode
Effect: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is half or less.
Chinese Hànzì: 達摩模式 / 达摩模式

Name: Victory Star
Effect: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
Chinese Hànzì: 勝利之星 / 胜利之星

Name: Turboblaze
Effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Chinese Hànzì: 渦輪火焰 / 涡轮火焰

Name: Teravolt
Effect: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Chinese Hànzì: 兆級電壓 / 兆级电压

Name: Aroma Veil
Effect: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

Name: Flower Veil
Effect: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

Name: Cheek Pouch
Effect: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

Name: Protean
Effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
Chinese Hànzì: 變幻自如 / 变幻自如

Name: Fur Coat
Effect: Halves the damage from physical moves.

Name: Magician
Effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

Name: Bulletproof
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

Name: Competitive
Effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

Name: Strong Jaw
Effect: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 強壯之顎 / 强壮之颚

Name: Refrigerate
Effect: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Chinese Hànzì: 冰凍皮膚 / 冰冻皮肤

Name: Sweet Veil
Effect: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

Name: Stance Change
Effect: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.
Chinese Hànzì: 戰鬥切換 / 战斗切换

Name: Gale Wings
Effect: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
Chinese Hànzì: 疾風之翼 / 疾风之翼

Name: Mega Launcher
Effect: Powers up aura and pulse moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 超級發射器 / 超级发射器

Name: Grass Pelt
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

Name: Symbiosis
Effect: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

Name: Tough Claws
Effect: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

Name: Pixilate
Effect: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Chinese Hànzì: 妖精皮膚 / 妖精皮肤

Name: Gooey
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Name: Aerilate
Effect: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Chinese Hànzì: 飛行皮膚 / 飞行皮肤

Name: Parental Bond
Effect: Parent and child each attacks.

Name: Dark Aura
Effect: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 暗黑氣場 / 暗黑气场

Name: Fairy Aura
Effect: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 妖精氣場 / 妖精气场

Name: Aura Break
Effect: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 氣場破壞 / 气场破坏

Name: Primordial Sea
Effect: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

Name: Desolate Land
Effect: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.
Chinese Hànzì: 終結之地 / 终结之地

Name: Delta Stream
Effect: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type's weaknesses.
Chinese Hànzì: 德爾塔氣流 / 德尔塔气流

Name: Stamina
Effect: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

Name: Wimp Out
Effect: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Chinese Hànzì: 躍躍欲逃 / 跃跃欲逃

Name: Emergency Exit
Effect: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Chinese Hànzì: 危險迴避 / 危险回避

Name: Water Compaction
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.
Chinese Romanized: Yù Shuǐ Nínggù / Yuh Séui Yìhnggu

Name: Merciless
Effect: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Chinese Hànzì: 不仁不義 / 不仁不义

Name: Shields Down
Effect: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.
Chinese Hànzì: 界限盾殼 / 界限盾壳

Name: Stakeout
Effect: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.

Name: Water Bubble
Effect: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Name: Steelworker
Effect: Powers up Steel-type moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 鋼能力者 / 钢能力者
Chinese Romanized: Gāng Nénglì Zhě / Gōng Nàhnglihk Jé

Name: Berserk
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Chinese Hànzì: 怒火沖天 / 怒火冲天

Name: Slush Rush
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Name: Long Reach
Effect: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

Name: Liquid Voice
Effect: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 濕潤之聲 / 湿润之声

Name: Triage
Effect: Gives priority to a healing move.
Chinese Hànzì: 先行治療 / 先行治疗

Name: Galvanize
Effect: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
Chinese Hànzì: 電氣皮膚 / 电气皮肤

Name: Surge Surfer
Effect: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
Chinese Hànzì: 衝浪之尾 / 冲浪之尾

Name: Schooling
Effect: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

Name: Disguise
Effect: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

Name: Battle Bond
Effect: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon's bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.
Chinese Hànzì: 牽絆變身 / 牵绊变身

Name: Power Construct
Effect: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
Chinese Hànzì: 群聚變形 / 群聚变形

Name: Corrosion
Effect: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

Name: Comatose
Effect: It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
Chinese Hànzì: 絕對睡眠 / 绝对睡眠

Name: Queenly Majesty
Effect: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 女王的威嚴 / 女王的威严

Name: Innards Out
Effect: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
Chinese Hànzì: 飛出的內在物 / 飞出的内在物
Chinese Romanized: Fēichū-de Nèizài Wù / Fēichēut-dīk Noihjoih Maht

Name: Dancer
Effect: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

Name: Battery
Effect: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

Name: Fluffy
Effect: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

Name: Dazzling
Effect: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
Chinese Hànzì: 鮮艷之軀 / 鲜艳之躯

Name: Soul-Heart
Effect: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

Name: Tangling Hair
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Name: Receiver
Effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Name: Power of Alchemy
Effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
Chinese Hànzì: 化學之力 / 化学之力

Name: Beast Boost
Effect: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
Chinese Hànzì: 異獸提升 / 异兽提升

Name: RKS System
Effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the memory disc it holds.

Name: Electric Surge
Effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Chinese Hànzì: 電氣製造者 / 电气制造者

Name: Psychic Surge
Effect: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Chinese Hànzì: 精神製造者 / 精神制造者

Name: Misty Surge
Effect: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Chinese Hànzì: 薄霧製造者 / 薄雾制造者

Name: Grassy Surge
Effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Chinese Hànzì: 青草製造者 / 青草制造者

Name: Full Metal Body
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Chinese Hànzì: 金屬防護 / 金属防护

Name: Shadow Shield
Effect: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

Name: Prism Armor
Effect: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Chinese Hànzì: 稜鏡裝甲 / 棱镜装甲

Name: Neuroforce
Effect: Powers up moves that are super effective.
Chinese Hànzì: 腦核之力 / 脑核之力
